article.aside: Expand the functionality of the template system with khttp_templatex(3) and khttp_templatex_buf(3), which allow the writing function to be overriden. This allows templates to play nicely with other systems such as kcgijson(3) and general dynamic buffer creation. I use this for creating mails for sending with libcurl. Also create an initial regression test harness that uses libcurl to create and parse HTTP messages over a local socket and a small server to translate the requests into CGI variables for kcgi. This can be run with make regress.
